name: Berry-Aide
description:
Flv boysenberry absolutely makes this recipe.
slight tart inhale with sweet exhale of berry
author: falon1000

reviews.text: Pleasant little simple recipe, but soft, not a ton of flavor. The lemon especially seems a bit watered down, both by the lower than average concentration of a fairly weak flavor, and by the cactus, which pokes out a bit without a more bitey lemon to overpower it. I would add some other lemon to this, like FE Lemon, VT Sour Lemon, or even just some FA Lemon Sicily, and maybe push the Boysenberry up to 3% as well.
